column4: I reallly don't want to reinstall Ubuntu all over again. I deleted the NetworkManager because it stoped working - I had a red signal on the icon -
Now I do not have any internet in my PC
Is there a way to make Ubuntu recongnize my PCI wifi card again?
There is some ping option, but that never works
can you restart network manager with sudo service network-manager restart ?
*sigh* I am gonna have to re install
does the card show up in lspci or ifconfig -a?
have u tried manually bringing up the connection? or specifying it in /etc/network/interfaces?
Yes, it shows in lspci, but I havent tryed to bring it  up  manually... I do not know how
I have : auto lo iface lo inet loopback
